name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Fusion**

The 2026 edition of Footprints Festival brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists from 10 countries, showcasing a vibrant tapestry of sounds that span the globe. With genres ranging from Electronic and Psychedelic to Malian Desert Blues, Armenian Folk, and Gospel, the festival is a melting pot of musical traditions and contemporary experimentation. The average artist rating of 7.73 highlights the high-quality performances attendees can expect, with most artists scoring in the 8-9 range.

Diversity takes center stage at this year’s festival, with seven out of the 11 artists identifying as people of color, reflecting a commitment to amplifying underrepresented voices. The lineup also includes a mix of male (8), female (2), and mixed-gender (1) acts, further emphasizing the festival’s inclusive ethos. Notably, Germany leads with four artists, while other performers hail from countries as varied as Iran, Nigeria, Turkey, and Brazil, creating a truly global experience.

Footprints Festival 2026 is a celebration of common ground through music, uniting audiences with its rich blend of cultures, genres, and stories. With every artist offering something unique—be it minimalist electropop, traditional Iranian melodies, or Afrobeat rhythms—this year’s event promises to be a journey across borders and sounds, leaving a lasting impression on all who attend.
